name: SC: Survivors
detailed_description:
DESCRIPTION

Solstice Chronicles: Survivors is a multiplayer top-down shooter with a tactical edge. Set in the year 117 AE (After Earth), you find yourself behind enemy lines in the midst of an infected colony on Mars.

STORY

Solstice Chronicles: Survivors storyline is set during the Tharsis outbreak of STROL virus. You are one of the Howell-Barrex corporation marines tasked with containing the STROL threat in cooperation with Elysium Corp. military.

FEATURES

  • Online CO-OP for up to 6 players - Work with other players to experience unique CO-OP gameplay. Be a hero, be a leader.
  • Survive and Control - Manage your resources, explore an open map and secure areas in order to survive.
  • Replayability - Randomly generated special locations, missions, monsters and events.
  • Upgrade Your Character - Unlock, equip and level up your favorite marine class.
  • Be a Leader - Use special leadership commands to guide your teammates to victory.
  • Dropship - You can use dropship to quickly evacuate to Safezone or transport your teammates to help you in a fight.
  • Inventory system - Find and gather items that will help you survive and defeat the biomass.
  • 8 unique classes - Define your playstyle by playing one out of 8 unique classes.
  • Hot Join - Call for reinforcements from your friends list mid-game.
